transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Sir very good morning.
Customer: Good morning.
Executive: Ayush baat kar raha hu sir IndiaMART se.
Customer: Ha yes.
Executive: Maine kaha sir abhi kar le video meeting?
Customer: Ha kar lete hai. Rukiye main aapko link share kar raha hu.
Executive: Mail pe bheju ya whatsapp karu aapko?
Customer: Mail pe karo. Mail pe to chala gaya sir check kariye.
Executive: Esales@limecam.com usse nahi usse nahi dusra fir aapko whatsapp pe bhi bhej deta hu sir main ek second rukiye.
Customer: Marketing one pe karo na.
Executive: Wo sir registered wali email id aapki yahi hai na is vajah se is pe jata hai sir ye.
Executive: Ek minute rukiye sir main whatsapp pe link share kar deta hu aap waha se connect kar lo, theek hai?
Customer: Time lagega usme.
Executive: Ab acha ek kaam kariye ek second ruko aap.
Customer: Theek hai sorry. Ek baar sir mujhe nahi nahi aap mujhe mail id bhejiye main abhi main aapko bhejta hu. Marketing marketing one ek second rukiye.
Customer: Marketing one @ @ impal.com
Executive: Impal H I M ha p c o l c o impal impal.com


Customer: Marketing one @ theek hai.
Executive: Dekhiye sir aaya aapke pass?
Customer: Nahi abhi tak nahi aaya. Ek baar refresh kariye.


Executive: Mila sir?
Customer: Nahi.
Executive: Abhi bhi mail nahi aaya.
Customer: Nahi mail nahi aaya abhi tak. Are

Executive: Kuch to bhi isme share hua hai sir.
Executive: Marketing ek second.
Executive: Ab dekhna sir aapke pass ab aaya?
Customer: Ha aa gaya. Aa gaya? Join kariye sir.
Executive: Ha screen share kar lijiye sir.
Executive: And maine aapko whatsapp pe call kar raha hu sir kyuki dono cheeze possible nahi hoti ek sath call and video meeting, theek hai?
Customer: Okay. Ha okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants to join the video meeting.

- Customer did not receive the meeting link.



Resolution:

- Executive shared the meeting link on email.

- Executive shared the meeting link on WhatsApp.

- Executive shared the meeting link on new email id.

- Customer joined the meeting.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- video meeting, link sharing, email
